original_title: Silent Night Holy Night with Walter Cronkite
overview: The story of Silent Night, Holy Night is retold by Walter Cronkite and the Mormon Tabernacle Choir and Orchestra at Temple Square to thousands of concertgoers at their annual Christmas concert.

production_companies.name: The Church of Jesus-Christ of Latter-Day Saints

tagline: Christmas with the Mormon Tabernacle Choir and Orchestra at Temple Square
title: Silent Night Holy Night with Walter Cronkite
